name: Space WithoutSpace
description:
Prevail over your friends in a last breath challenge to gain the dominance of space!

As an astronaut, you need to ensure the survival of your species by colonizing the sky map and totalize the highest score. You will not be the only one to pursue this objective. Exhibit good timing to jump among planets and avoid orbiting asteroids, that will increase as more players land there.  You also have to manage wisely your oxygen resources, that can be only refilled in a specific kind of planet.    

Let the conquest of space begin!
